examples.example: 当我遇到困难时，朋友们都很热心地过来帮忙。

translate.english: When I encounter difficulties, friends all come to help very enthusiastically.

examples.example: 他总是乐于助人，时刻准备着给有困难的人帮忙。

translate.english: He is always ready to help others and is always prepared to offer assistance to those in difficulties.

examples.example: 每次有需要帮忙的事情，邻居们总是很热情地伸出援手。

translate.english: Every time there is something that needs help, the neighbors always reach out their hands enthusiastically.
